org.ligoj.app.resource.subscription

Interface LongTaskRunnerSubscription<T extends AbstractLongTaskSubscription,R extends LongTaskSubscriptionRepository<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LongTaskRunner<T,R,Subscription,java.lang.Integer,SubscriptionRepository>

    public interface LongTaskRunnerSubscription<T extends AbstractLongTaskSubscription,R extends LongTaskSubscriptionRepository<T>>
extends LongTaskRunner<T,R,Subscription,java.lang.Integer,SubscriptionRepository>
    A resource running some long task. Implementing this interface causes the subscription management checks there is no running task when a deletion is requested. The contract :
    • At most one task can run per node
    • A subscription cannot be deleted while there is a running attached task
    • A running task is task without "end" date.
    • When a task is started, is will always ends.
    • When a task ends, the status (boolean) is always updated.
